name: Infiniterra Tech Support
description:
Before you know it (and certainly before you'd want to), you're on the hypertrain barrelling above the streets of Seattle. Flecks of color dot the world below; people and hoverbikes and perhaps the occasional taxi.

Soon, the megalith office-building you're forced to call home appears from behind a skyscraper. Infiniterra Tech, teleportation company and global superpower.

-

A semiprocedural Twine game about working tech support. The tech in question? A personal multiversal travel device, brought to you by the most powerful company in the world. Navigate the manual, answer customer tickets, go home at the end of the day, and wake up to do it all over again.
